name: Star Chaser (PixelP3rfect)
description:
Lore:

A star fell down from the sky, inside the star was the child of the stars, that wants to get back all the missing star pieces , so she can get back home.

Gameplay:

  • side scroller Game
  • The Game gets harder as time goes on / les checkpoints more enemies
  • The Player has 5HP / falling down or in to spikes ressets you to the last checkpoint and you lose -1HP  / Hit by enemy -1HP 
  • if you lose all 5Hp GAME OVER you have to restart 

Controls:

  • Keyboard: Walking  / Quick hold    / Jump
  • Controller:  Walking    /  Quick hold A    / Jump X  

Credits:

  • Drawings  Aseprite
  • Music by ES_Glitching Through the Sky - William Benckert
